Chicopee.Maplewood Hotel: The Maplewood Hotel is a historic residential hotel at 328-330 Maple Street in Holyoke, Massachusetts. It consists of two buildings that have become conjoined by internal connections. The 2.5 story brick block at 330 Maple Street was built first, between 1884 and 1889, while the four story building at 328 Maple Street was built c.
